name: High-voltage Transformer
description: A high voltage transformer of a microwave oven has a structure for radiating heat efficiently.

name: Cooling Fan
description: Cooling fan protects the electronic components as well as help the cooking area get rid of excess heat.

name: Cooking Cavity
description: The stainless steel cavity facilitates better heating process and protection against leakage of microwave waves.

name: Waveguide
description: The waveguide cover protects the magnetron and other electronic components of the microwave from splashbacks caused by cooking.

name: Turntable
description: The turntable can turn in either direction when the microwave starts cooking.

name: Magnetron
description: Magnetron is an important source of power in microwave ovens.
